scripts.update: npx npm-check-updates --upgrade && npm install && npm run backend:update && npm run frontend:update
scripts.docker:run: npm run docker:build && docker run --rm --name console -p 3000:3000 -e PORT=3000 -v $PWD/backend/certs:/app/certs -v $PWD/backend/config:/app/config --env-file=backend/.env console | ./backend/node_modules/.bin/pino-zen -i time && docker rm -f console
scripts.docker:deploy: npm run docker:build && docker tag console quay.io/$USER/console:latest && docker push quay.io/$USER/console:latest && ./scripts/patch-deployment.sh latest quay.io/$USER/console
scripts.podman:run: npm run podman:build && podman run --rm --name console -p 3000:3000 -e PORT=3000 -v $PWD/backend/certs:/app/certs -v $PWD/backend/config:/app/config --env-file=backend/.env console | ./backend/node_modules/.bin/pino-zen -i time && podman rm -f console
scripts.podman:deploy: npm run podman:build && podman tag console quay.io/$USER/console:latest && podman push quay.io/$USER/console:latest && ./scripts/patch-deployment.sh latest quay.io/$USER/console
